title: email
body: I made my account awhile back and the email i used is now invalid, how can i transfer my account onto another email?

replies.body: If you no longer have access to the previous email, don't worry!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our account team can help you out!  You'll need to verify account ownership, and they can take it from there.  We'll respond asap!
